title: HAHALAND Pop Up Montessori Toys for 1 Year Olds Boys & Girls with Hammers - Early Development & Activity Toys for Kids Birthdays
features: AMAZING 5 POP-UP ANIMAL TOYS - This delightful pop-up toy is perfect for babies toddlers aged 12+ months. The toy features adorable animal characters and plays happy music, which can be adjusted to the desired volume. This fun toy helps to improve fine motor skills and encourages natural curiosity, while also teaching cause and effect, inspires exploration and hand-eye coordination

3 PLAY MODES - In sound and music mode, the toy plays animal sounds or music when an animal pops up. In game/music and light mode, the correct animal must be popped up when the light stops. In off mode, the animal pops up when the button is activated by pushing, fliding, turning, pressing, sliding. The toy helps develop fine motor skills, color and animal recognition, and hand flexibility

GREAT DESIGNS FOR BABY - With its bright colors, numbers, and cute animal characters (including a hippo, raccoon, lion, elephant, and fox), this pop-up activity toy is sure to provide endless fun for your little one. It can also help to teach sharing and communication skills, as well as strengthen the bond between parent and child. The toy is designed with a convenient handle that is perfect for small hands to grasp and improves your baby's grip ability

SAFE MATERIALS & UNIQUE DESIGNS - This versatile and colorful toy is made of BPA-free, non-toxic, and phthalate-free materials, ensuring that it is safe for your little one to play with. The toy is built to be sturdy and durable, and has rounded and smooth edges to prevent any injuries. It's a perfect educational toy that provides hours of screen-free play time with fun animal sounds and music

WORRY-FREE AFTER-SALE SERVICE - If you're looking for a gifts idea toys for 1 2 3 4 boys girls, this pop-up cause-and-effect toy is the perfect choice. It makes for a great gift for holidays, birthday parties, or festivals like Easter, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, and New Year. The toy requires 3 x AA batteries (not included). We hope that our product will bring joy to your baby. If there are any issues, please let us know and we will work to provide a satisfying solution
